title: RIP The Logo
author: VD
content_html:
Jerry West, one of the most important figures in the history of the NBA, has passed away at the age of 86. West, the inspiration for the silhouette of the leagueâ€™s logo, was a 14-time All-Star during his playing career with the Los Angeles Lakers.

ðŸ”¸8x NBA champion as executive

Jerry West was so well-respected by his opponents that his longtime rival Bill Russell of the Celtics paid his own way to attend Westâ€™s memorial game in LA before his retirement.
